summary:
### **Kula Gold Limited – Quarterly Report (June 2025) – Material Highlights**  

#### **Exploration Results**  
- **High-grade gold intercepts at Mt Palmer Gold Project (80% JV):**  
  - **1m splits:**  
    - 18m @ **4.4g/t** (incl. 2m @ **31.3g/t**)  
    - 7m @ **7.7g/t** (incl. 3m @ **17.2g/t**)  
  - **3m composites:**  
    - 9m @ **13.6g/t** (incl. 3m @ **38.4g/t**)  
    - 20m @ **7.5g/t** (incl. 6m @ **23.8g/t**)  
- Shallow mineralization suggests potential **low-cost open-pit extraction**.  
- **Resource definition work on historic tailings** nearing completion (early Q3 2025).  

#### **Corporate & Financials**  
- **Cash balance (30 June 2025):** **$206k** (down from $595k last quarter).  
- **Quarterly cash burn:** **$540k** (operating activities).
